title: Her Ihanet Sevgiyle Baslar
episode_desc: Ezel and his team arrive to Cyprus to avenge Ömer, who has been betrayed by his best friends in 1997, twelve years ago.
show_desc: Betrayed by his trusted friends and the woman he loved, Ömer Uçar returns as Ezel to exact his vengeance.

title: Seni Seven Senin Kurbanindir
episode_desc: Ezel begins his revenge. We get to know Eysan's past.
show_desc: Betrayed by his trusted friends and the woman he loved, Ömer Uçar returns as Ezel to exact his vengeance.

title: Ask Ölümden Güclüdür
episode_desc: Eysan's motivation for betraying Ömer 12 years earlier is revealed. Ezel learns Eysan's son has endangered himself and decides whether to intervene.
show_desc: Betrayed by his trusted friends and the woman he loved, Ömer Uçar returns as Ezel to exact his vengeance.

title: En Zoru Eve Dönmektir
episode_desc: Back in 1997, an unlikely protector defends Ömer when he is targeted in prison, and Cengiz takes desperate measures to ensure Eysan stays with him.
show_desc: Betrayed by his trusted friends and the woman he loved, Ömer Uçar returns as Ezel to exact his vengeance.

title: Ask mi Kaderi Kovalar, Kader mi Aski
episode_desc: In 2001, Ömer is mentored by fellow inmate Ramiz and gets a surprise visitor. Four years later, a riot allows him to escape his sentence and identity.
show_desc: Betrayed by his trusted friends and the woman he loved, Ömer Uçar returns as Ezel to exact his vengeance.

title: Hayaller Hayaletler
episode_desc: When Bahar suffers a health crisis, Ezel comes to her rescue. An unexpected stop during a road trip with Cengiz brings Ezel to his family's home.
show_desc: Betrayed by his trusted friends and the woman he loved, Ömer Uçar returns as Ezel to exact his vengeance.

title: Gitmek/Kalmak
episode_desc: Ezel selects a target. A newly released Ramiz recalls Ezel's failed attempt at getting revenge in 2005. Bahar steals some time alone with Ezel.
show_desc: Betrayed by his trusted friends and the woman he loved, Ömer Uçar returns as Ezel to exact his vengeance.

title: Akreple kurbaga
episode_desc: Ezel learns Bahar is hiding a secret, and finds a way to spend time with Eysan. Unable to find any dirt on Ezel, Ali investigates his driver, Kamil.
show_desc: Betrayed by his trusted friends and the woman he loved, Ömer Uçar returns as Ezel to exact his vengeance.

title: En kötü ihtimal
episode_desc: Ezel takes Eysan to a nostalgic place. Ali digs up dirt on Ezel's assistant, Sebnem, and makes her an offer. Mert and his mother run into Eysan.
show_desc: Betrayed by his trusted friends and the woman he loved, Ömer Uçar returns as Ezel to exact his vengeance.

title: Sadakat
episode_desc: When Mert's mother, Meliha, is introduced to Ezel at a get-together, she has a strong reaction that makes Cengiz wary. Eysan finds a worrying note.
show_desc: Betrayed by his trusted friends and the woman he loved, Ömer Uçar returns as Ezel to exact his vengeance.

title: Utanç
episode_desc: Cengiz and Ali take the bait that Ezel has dangled in front of them. A disturbing text message prompts Eysan to visit her father.
show_desc: Betrayed by his trusted friends and the woman he loved, Ömer Uçar returns as Ezel to exact his vengeance.

title: Yalniz kalmak
episode_desc: When Ali confronts Eysan for visiting her father, she fears the worst has happened to him. Ezel secretly visits his mother, but Mert catches him.
show_desc: Betrayed by his trusted friends and the woman he loved, Ömer Uçar returns as Ezel to exact his vengeance.

title: Kaçinilmaz
episode_desc: Ezel takes Bahar to an orphanage linked to his past. Ali recalls returning to work for Cengiz in 2006, and their love-hate relationship since then.
show_desc: Betrayed by his trusted friends and the woman he loved, Ömer Uçar returns as Ezel to exact his vengeance.

title: ilk Günah
episode_desc: Cengiz remembers running a DNA test on his son in 2006. While seducing Bahar, Ezel feels conflicted. Cengiz catches Eysan taking birth control pills.
show_desc: Betrayed by his trusted friends and the woman he loved, Ömer Uçar returns as Ezel to exact his vengeance.

title: Çikar yol
episode_desc: Mert's plans for writing an article about Ömer put his life at risk. Eysan's father secretly develops a relationship with his grandson.
show_desc: Betrayed by his trusted friends and the woman he loved, Ömer Uçar returns as Ezel to exact his vengeance.

title: Dönüs yolu
episode_desc: When Cengiz gets in trouble at a nightclub, Ezel's loyalties from his former life as Ömer are tested. Ezel has a heart-to-heart talk with Bahar.
show_desc: Betrayed by his trusted friends and the woman he loved, Ömer Uçar returns as Ezel to exact his vengeance.

title: Geçmisin ayak izleri
episode_desc: Mert interviews a reluctant Cengiz, Eysan and Ali for his article. Afterward, Ezel and Ali accompany Mert on a fact-finding mission to the prison.
show_desc: Betrayed by his trusted friends and the woman he loved, Ömer Uçar returns as Ezel to exact his vengeance.

title: Gitmesine izin vermek
episode_desc: In order to protect Mert, Ezel makes a painful decision. Eysan follows a hunch about her husband. Mert takes a risk to investigate an anonymous tip.
show_desc: Betrayed by his trusted friends and the woman he loved, Ömer Uçar returns as Ezel to exact his vengeance.

title: Gercekleri Ogrenme Zamani
episode_desc: Worried about her son's future, Eysan decides to introduce Can to Ömer's family. Can reveals to his grandfather that he saw what was on the videotape.
show_desc: Betrayed by his trusted friends and the woman he loved, Ömer Uçar returns as Ezel to exact his vengeance.

title: Emanet
episode_desc: Eysan spots her husband with another woman. Cengiz is asked to choose between his friendship with Ali and his partnership with Ezel. Ali tests Ezel.
show_desc: Betrayed by his trusted friends and the woman he loved, Ömer Uçar returns as Ezel to exact his vengeance.

title: Ailede bir olüm
episode_desc: Can steals the videotape. Mert changes his mind and publishes an article on Ömer. A haunting message leads Ali to believe he's been cursed.
show_desc: Betrayed by his trusted friends and the woman he loved, Ömer Uçar returns as Ezel to exact his vengeance.

title: Masumiyet
episode_desc: Ezel's mother confronts him about his letter to Mert. Ezel asks Bahar to prove her love for him. Paranoia consumes Ali. Eysan salvages her pride.
show_desc: Betrayed by his trusted friends and the woman he loved, Ömer Uçar returns as Ezel to exact his vengeance.

title: Oyunbozan
episode_desc: Ali misinterprets the surprise awaiting him at the casino. Eysan's father visits Cengiz with a demand. Ezel leads Eysan to make a shameful move.
show_desc: Betrayed by his trusted friends and the woman he loved, Ömer Uçar returns as Ezel to exact his vengeance.

title: Baslasin intikam
episode_desc: Bahar accuses Ezel of breaking a promise. Cengiz scrambles to secure a multi-million-dollar loan in time for submitting a bid for the hotel project.
show_desc: Betrayed by his trusted friends and the woman he loved, Ömer Uçar returns as Ezel to exact his vengeance.

title: Gercegin Gucu
episode_desc: Bahar goes on an upsetting dinner date. Eysan reveals the depth of her hate for her husband. Ezel's sidekicks, Sebnem and Kamil, are caught off guard.
show_desc: Betrayed by his trusted friends and the woman he loved, Ömer Uçar returns as Ezel to exact his vengeance.

title: En Onemli Sey
episode_desc: To save his own life, Cengiz negotiates with his father-in-law. A mission tests Tevfik's loyalties. A conflicted Ezel makes a confession to Eysan.
show_desc: Betrayed by his trusted friends and the woman he loved, Ömer Uçar returns as Ezel to exact his vengeance.

title: Kimin Tarafindasin
episode_desc: Cengiz and his father-in-law plan to bait Ezel. Eysan's aunt calls Ezel's mother. Ali tries to flee Turkey. Eysan succumbs to her attraction to Ezel.
show_desc: Betrayed by his trusted friends and the woman he loved, Ömer Uçar returns as Ezel to exact his vengeance.

title: Bizden Biri
episode_desc: Tevfik recalls his original crime. Ezel gets Ali to work for him without knowing it. Serdar finds an informant with knowledge of Ezel's past.
show_desc: Betrayed by his trusted friends and the woman he loved, Ömer Uçar returns as Ezel to exact his vengeance.

title: Surgun
episode_desc: After learning Ezel had a second mentor, Serdar and Ali pay her a visit. Mert meets with troubled orphan Eren. Eysan relives a moment from her past.
show_desc: Betrayed by his trusted friends and the woman he loved, Ömer Uçar returns as Ezel to exact his vengeance.

title: Ozlemek
episode_desc: Eren steals a gun and goes to visit Mert. Ali and Serdar raid the home of Ezel's plastic surgeon. To find out who Serdar is, Tevfik picks his pocket.
show_desc: Betrayed by his trusted friends and the woman he loved, Ömer Uçar returns as Ezel to exact his vengeance.

title: Yasama Sebebi
episode_desc: Bahar tells Ezel about her upbringing. Mert figures out who betrayed Ömer. Tevfik learns of the videotape. Serdar tracks down Ezel's old taxi driver.
show_desc: Betrayed by his trusted friends and the woman he loved, Ömer Uçar returns as Ezel to exact his vengeance.

title: Haksizliga Karsi
episode_desc: After getting the proof he needs to put away his old friends, Ezel must decide whether to continue with his vengeance or return home to his family.
show_desc: Betrayed by his trusted friends and the woman he loved, Ömer Uçar returns as Ezel to exact his vengeance.

title: Ikinci hayat
episode_desc: At the casino, Ezel and Cengiz literally put their darkest secrets on the table. Ali and Tevfik try to find Serdar before he can make his escape.
show_desc: Betrayed by his trusted friends and the woman he loved, Ömer Uçar returns as Ezel to exact his vengeance.

title: Imkansiz
episode_desc: Eren receives the package that Serdar mailed while making his escape. Ramiz gives Tevfik his next mission. Ezel hires Mert for the hotel project.
show_desc: Betrayed by his trusted friends and the woman he loved, Ömer Uçar returns as Ezel to exact his vengeance.

title: Hiçbir seyi olmayan Adam
episode_desc: Cengiz suspects Eysan is cheating on him and follows her. Ali persuades Sebnem to play hooky with him. Ezel tries to convince Eysan to leave Cengiz.
show_desc: Betrayed by his trusted friends and the woman he loved, Ömer Uçar returns as Ezel to exact his vengeance.

title: Son kabadayi
episode_desc: Ezel asks Ali to join forces with him against Cengiz. A piece of jewelry triggers a flashback that leads Cengiz to a horrifying realization.
show_desc: Betrayed by his trusted friends and the woman he loved, Ömer Uçar returns as Ezel to exact his vengeance.

title: Baslangic - Bitis
episode_desc: Ezel's plans spin out of control when Ramiz mysteriously disappears, Cengiz starts asking too many questions and Eysan makes a life-changing decision.
show_desc: Betrayed by his trusted friends and the woman he loved, Ömer Uçar returns as Ezel to exact his vengeance.

title: Küçük Hayat Büyük Adim
episode_desc: Cengiz's tolerance of Eysan's humiliations reaches its limit. Ramiz plays the pitiful victim to regain the upper hand in the casino business.
show_desc: Betrayed by his trusted friends and the woman he loved, Ömer Uçar returns as Ezel to exact his vengeance.

title: Aile güzel bir hayaldir
episode_desc: After making a shocking revelation, Tevfik calls Ali's bluff. Cengiz stalks a man he claims is Eysan's lover. Eysan is shown a note from Ömer.

title: Kirli zevklerimiz
episode_desc: Eysan finds out what the key is for. When Cengiz tortures Eysan's supposed lover to make him confess, Ezel feels pressured to give himself up.
show_desc: Betrayed by his trusted friends and the woman he loved, Ömer Uçar returns as Ezel to exact his vengeance.

title: Akil ve kalp
episode_desc: Mümtaz risks his health trying to reunite with Ömer. Refusing to give up his dream of taking down Ramiz, Ali ropes Cengiz and Ezel into helping him.
show_desc: Betrayed by his trusted friends and the woman he loved, Ömer Uçar returns as Ezel to exact his vengeance.

title: Gölge oyunu
episode_desc: Mümtaz refuses to have life-saving surgery. Ramiz's only surviving betrayer tells a shocking story that changes the way Ezel views his mentor.
show_desc: Betrayed by his trusted friends and the woman he loved, Ömer Uçar returns as Ezel to exact his vengeance.

title: Iki ev
episode_desc: Ezel finds a camcorder with footage that reveals the face of Ramiz's fourth child. Cengiz takes an interest in Ramiz's biographer.
show_desc: Betrayed by his trusted friends and the woman he loved, Ömer Uçar returns as Ezel to exact his vengeance.

title: iki Sehrin Hikayesi
episode_desc: Azad is lured into a trap. Bahar issues an ultimatum when she finds her father has manipulated Eysan into providing him refuge in her home.
show_desc: Betrayed by his trusted friends and the woman he loved, Ömer Uçar returns as Ezel to exact his vengeance.

title: ip Ucu
episode_desc: Ezel and Ramiz trick the assassin stalking Azad. Mert reveals his suspicions to Ezel. Bahar meets Ezel, but it's not the reunion she was hoping for.
show_desc: Betrayed by his trusted friends and the woman he loved, Ömer Uçar returns as Ezel to exact his vengeance.

title: Sirdas
episode_desc: Mert visits Ramiz to confirm his suspicions, and later provokes Ali into unconsciously revealing where proof of Ömer's innocence can be found.
show_desc: Betrayed by his trusted friends and the woman he loved, Ömer Uçar returns as Ezel to exact his vengeance.

title: Tanisdigimiz Gün
episode_desc: Ezel meets with Mert to reveal his true identity. Ramiz spares Ali's life in exchange for the promise of another's. Can receives a diagnosis.
show_desc: Betrayed by his trusted friends and the woman he loved, Ömer Uçar returns as Ezel to exact his vengeance.

title: Askta ve Savasta
episode_desc: Ramiz finds Cengiz's weakness and leverages it to force him to do his bidding. Ezel, Ali and Eysan play along, aiming to get Cengiz arrested.
show_desc: Betrayed by his trusted friends and the woman he loved, Ömer Uçar returns as Ezel to exact his vengeance.

title: Mutlu Yillara
episode_desc: Bahar visits Ezel to tell him of an important decision she's made. Ezel suggests to Cengiz that he take his family on a vacation overseas.
show_desc: Betrayed by his trusted friends and the woman he loved, Ömer Uçar returns as Ezel to exact his vengeance.

episode_desc: Ali is forced to finish a job for Ramiz that will incriminate Cengiz but put his own life at risk. Cengiz experiences exactly what Ömer once did.
show_desc: Betrayed by his trusted friends and the woman he loved, Ömer Uçar returns as Ezel to exact his vengeance.

title: Güzel ve Çirkin
episode_desc: Now that Cengiz has been dealt with, Ezel moves on to his next target: Eysan. But a sudden emotional reaction leads him to make a change in plans.
show_desc: Betrayed by his trusted friends and the woman he loved, Ömer Uçar returns as Ezel to exact his vengeance.

episode_desc: Serdar spies on a newly released Ezel making plans with Eysan and Ali, and demands a piece of the action. In court, Eysan takes the witness stand.
show_desc: Betrayed by his trusted friends and the woman he loved, Ömer Uçar returns as Ezel to exact his vengeance.

episode_desc: When Eysan makes a sudden decision that threatens Ezel's plans for getting revenge against her, he throws caution to the wind to change her mind.

title: Utanç
episode_desc: Serdar tells Cengiz what he witnessed while spying on Eysan, Ezel and Ali. Eysan begs Bahar for forgiveness. Ali realizes Bahar's cancer has returned.
show_desc: Betrayed by his trusted friends and the woman he loved, Ömer Uçar returns as Ezel to exact his vengeance.

episode_desc: After warning Eysan about Ezel, Cengiz receives a visit from him. Bahar makes a heartbreaking decision about what she'll do next with her life.
show_desc: Betrayed by his trusted friends and the woman he loved, Ömer Uçar returns as Ezel to exact his vengeance.

title: Ayrilsak da...
episode_desc: A mysterious visitor seeks to exchange intel with Cengiz. Ezel makes a shocking declaration to Bahar. Eysan shares her suspicions about Ezel with Ali.
show_desc: Betrayed by his trusted friends and the woman he loved, Ömer Uçar returns as Ezel to exact his vengeance.

episode_desc: A visit with Cengiz shatters Ali's trust in Tevfik. Bahar confronts Ali about his betrayal of Ömer. Tevfik has a heart-to-heart talk with Sebnem.

episode_desc: Tevfik is forced to choose between Ezel and Ali. Bahar asks Ezel a hypothetical question, and later learns her father was involved in betraying Ömer.
show_desc: Betrayed by his trusted friends and the woman he loved, Ömer Uçar returns as Ezel to exact his vengeance.

title: Zamansiz
episode_desc: Cengiz learns the significance of the number 12 etched on his arm. When Ali refuses to give in to Ramiz, Ezel and his team must rescue hostage Tevfik.
show_desc: Betrayed by his trusted friends and the woman he loved, Ömer Uçar returns as Ezel to exact his vengeance.

title: Kurtar Beni
episode_desc: Cengiz is extracted from prison, but must pay a price afterward. Ezel gets himself in a room alone with Ali, who reveals a secret about Tevfik.
show_desc: Betrayed by his trusted friends and the woman he loved, Ömer Uçar returns as Ezel to exact his vengeance.

episode_desc: Bahar learns Eysan lied in court to put Cengiz in prison, causing her to question her sister's motive for betraying Ömer. Tevfik says his goodbyes.
show_desc: Betrayed by his trusted friends and the woman he loved, Ömer Uçar returns as Ezel to exact his vengeance.

title: Intikam
episode_desc: Sebnem goes to see Tevfik one last time. Cengiz lays a trap to get Eysan alone in the house. Eysan and Ezel let go of everything holding them back.
show_desc: Betrayed by his trusted friends and the woman he loved, Ömer Uçar returns as Ezel to exact his vengeance.

episode_desc: Ali receives a clue to the link between Ezel and Ramiz. Eysan learns someone has already bought her confiscated properties. Bahar cuts ties with Ezel.
show_desc: Betrayed by his trusted friends and the woman he loved, Ömer Uçar returns as Ezel to exact his vengeance.

episode_desc: Ali visits the military hospital where Ömer was treated. Eysan confesses her dark sin to Ezel. Mümtaz learns what Cengiz and his friends did to Ömer.
show_desc: Betrayed by his trusted friends and the woman he loved, Ömer Uçar returns as Ezel to exact his vengeance.

title: Güzel Günlerdi
episode_desc: Ali is given a chance to redeem himself. Ezel loses a friend. Mümtaz won't forgive himself for not believing that Ömer was innocent.
show_desc: Betrayed by his trusted friends and the woman he loved, Ömer Uçar returns as Ezel to exact his vengeance.

title: Elimde Kalanlar
episode_desc: Bahar offers Ali a deal. Meliha questions Mümtaz's closeness to Can. Ezel makes Eysan feel the same way Ömer did when he realized he'd been betrayed.

title: Yalniz Bir Adam
episode_desc: Eysan makes a difficult sacrifice, leaving behind a revealing letter. When Ezel goes alone to meet Ramiz's nemesis, he's greeted by a surprise.
show_desc: Betrayed by his trusted friends and the woman he loved, Ömer Uçar returns as Ezel to exact his vengeance.

title: Mükemmel Bir Cinayet
episode_desc: Ali wants to redeem himself by sacrificing his life. Bahar offers words of encouragement to Ezel, who is convinced he's incapable of loving his son.
show_desc: Betrayed by his trusted friends and the woman he loved, Ömer Uçar returns as Ezel to exact his vengeance.

episode_desc: Ali accompanies Bahar to the hospital, where she gets test results. Ezel offers Ali a path to redemption. Bahar asks Eysan to do what's best for Can.
show_desc: Betrayed by his trusted friends and the woman he loved, Ömer Uçar returns as Ezel to exact his vengeance.

title: Mutlu Sonlara Kim Inanir?
episode_desc: Cengiz watches helplessly as a horrifying scene unfolds. Ezel learns who masterminded Ömer's betrayal, and what Eysan's motive was for cooperating.
show_desc: Betrayed by his trusted friends and the woman he loved, Ömer Uçar returns as Ezel to exact his vengeance.

title: ...Ama Herkes Ölmez
episode_desc: Tevfik stands up against Ramiz. After Ezel hears Kenan's side of the story, he questions Ramiz's trustworthiness. Serdar re-enters Eysan's life.
show_desc: Betrayed by his trusted friends and the woman he loved, Ömer Uçar returns as Ezel to exact his vengeance.
